description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Coconut Chicken, Coconut Yoghurt And Pineapple Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Spiced Coconut Chicken, Coconut Yoghurt And Pineapple Skewers
name: Spiced Coconut Chicken, Coconut Yoghurt And Pineapple Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: Combine coconut milk, lime juice and spices in a shallow glass or ceramic dish. Add chicken legs and stir to coat. Cover and set aside in fridge for at least 30 minutes to marinate. Preheat oven to 200oC. Place a small wire rack over a baking tray lined with baking paper. Drain chicken of excess marinade and place on prepared rack. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until or until the juices run clear when the drumsticks are pierced in the thickest part. Set aside to cool. Cover and refrigerate until ready to pack in lunch box. Serve with sweet potato and cherry tomatoes. Snack 1: Place yoghurt in an airtight container and top with coconut. Snack 2: Cut pineapple into stars and thread on short straws.
